001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
004import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
005import org.bitcoinj.core.InsufficientMoneyException;
006
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.Collection;
009import java.util.Collections;
010import java.util.List;
011
012/**
013 *
014 */
015public interface SigningUtils {
016    /* private */ Coin MIN_NONDUST_OUTPUT = Coin.valueOf(546);
017    static TransactionOutputData createDustOutput(Address address) {
018        TransactionOutputData test = new TransactionOutputAddress(Coin.ZERO, address);
019        Coin dustAmount = SigningUtils.getMinNonDustValue(test);
020        return new TransactionOutputAddress(dustAmount, address);
021    }
022
023    static Coin getMinNonDustValue(TransactionOutputData data) {
024        return MIN_NONDUST_OUTPUT.times(3);  // TODO: Fix this
025    }
026
027    static SigningRequest addChange(SigningRequest request, Address changeAddress, FeeCalculator calculator) throws InsufficientMoneyException {
028        Coin fee = calculator.calculateFee(addOutput(request, changeAddress, Coin.ZERO));
029        long change = sumInputSats(request.inputs()) - sumOutputSats(request.outputs()) - fee.value;
030        if (change < 0) {
031            throw new InsufficientMoneyException(Coin.ofSat(-change));
032        }
033        return (change > 0) ? addOutput(request, changeAddress, Coin.ofSat(change)) : request;
034    }
035
036    private static SigningRequest addOutput(SigningRequest req, Address address, Coin amount) {
037        List<TransactionOutputData> outs = append(req.outputs(),
038                new TransactionOutputAddress(amount, address));
039        return SigningRequest.of(req.inputs(), outs);
040    }
041
042    private static <T> List<T> append(List<T> list, T element) {
043        List<T> modifiable = new ArrayList<>(list);
044        modifiable.add(element);
045        return Collections.unmodifiableList(modifiable);
046    }
047
048    /**
049     *
050     * @param request
051     * @return The fee that will be paid from a set of inputs and outputs
052     */
053    static Coin getFee(SigningRequest request) {
054        return getFee(request.inputs(), request.outputs());
055    }
056
057    /**
058     *
059     * @param inputs
060     * @param outputs
061     * @return The fee that will be paid from a set of inputs and outputs
062     */
063    static Coin getFee(Collection<TransactionInputData> inputs, Collection<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
064        return Coin.ofSat(sumInputSats(inputs) - sumOutputSats(outputs));
065    }
066
067    /**
068     * Calculate the total value of a collection of transaction inputs.
069     *
070     * @param inputs list of transaction outputs to total
071     * @return total value in satoshis
072     */
073    static Coin sumInputs(Collection<TransactionInputData> inputs) {
074        return Coin.ofSat(sumInputSats(inputs));
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * Calculate the total value of a collection of transaction outputs.
079     *
080     * @param outputs list of transaction outputs to total
081     * @return total value in satoshis
082     */
083    static Coin sumOutputs(Collection<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
084        return Coin.ofSat(sumOutputSats(outputs));
085    }
086
087    static /* private */ long sumInputSats(Collection<TransactionInputData> inputs) {
088        return inputs.stream()
089                .mapToLong(input -> input.amount().toSat())
090                .sum();
091    }
092
093    static /* private */ long sumOutputSats(Collection<TransactionOutputData> outputs) {
094        return outputs.stream()
095                .mapToLong(output -> output.amount().toSat())
096                .sum();
097    }
098}
